column6: "KITCHEN IRISH" 5 (OF 6) Finn Cooley's got the kind of face only a mother could love... and Frank Castle can't wait to put a hollow point right between his eyes.
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Dean White
